OrgName.entry: KUMON CROOKES ENGLISH AND MATHS STUDY CENTRE

Desc.entry: Offers tuition in maths and English. Part of a national after school study programme for children of all ages and abilities. Individual study programmes for children of all abilities, to help boost confidence and concentration.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues 3.30-5.30pm & Thurs 3.30-6pm at St Thomas Church, Nairn Street, S10 1UL (drop-in classes)
